text.mine-lights.about.title: MineLights
text.mine-lights.about.support_intro: If ye fancy this mod, consider offerin' a bit o' tribute for its makin':
text.mine-lights.about.kofi: Buy me a Grog on Ko-fi
text.mine-lights.about.description: MineLights be a Minecraft Fabric mod that brings shinin' RGB lights to the Java Edition seas.
option.mine-lights.enableMod.tooltip: Turns all them shiny lights on or off, savvy?
option.mine-lights.autoStartServer.toolt:
If ye hoist this flag, the mod will launch the server automatically
if it ain't runnin'. The server's EXE must be in the
'MineLights' chest inside yer .minecraft cove.
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.label: Count th' Trinkets Anew
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.toolt:
If ye plug in a new trinket while sailin' th' high seas,
check this and save to make it appear in the manifest.
option.mine-lights.restart.label: Scuttle th' Server!
option.mine-lights.restart.tooltip:
If the server process goes to Davy Jones' Locker,
check this here box an' save to raise it from the depths!
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.label: Scuttle th' Server... as Cap'n!
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.tooltip:
Use this if yer crew like Mystic Light be causin' a mutiny.
Requires Cap'n's privileges.
option.mine-lights.device.header: Mark which trinkets ye want to enable below, matey:
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.label: Re-enable All Trinkets
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.toolti: Check this box to clear the list o' all cursed trinkets.
option.mine-lights.enableSaturationBar.t:
Shows yer grub saturation on F9-F12.
Switches to yer air level when ye be takin' a dive.
option.mine-lights.enableExperienceBar.t: Shows yer experience level on keys 1-0.
option.mine-lights.enableLocatorBar.tool: Shows the direction o' other scallywags or waypoints on keys 1-0.
option.mine-lights.alwaysShowCompass.too:
If enabled, the star chart will always show the way to the world spawn,
even if ye don't have one.
It'll be overridden if ye pick up any compass.
option.mine-lights.compassPriority.toolt: Decides which star chart to follow if ye have many in yer hold.
option.mine-lights.highlightMovementKeys: Highlights WASD, Sprint, Sneak, an' Jump keys.
option.mine-lights.pulseChatKey.tooltip: When ye spy a missive, the chat key be flashin’ thrice
option.mine-lights.enableBiomeEffects.to: Sets a base keyboard colour based on th' island ye be standin' on.
option.mine-lights.dimmingMode.tooltip: Pick how the world's glow be dulled by the lightin' around ye.
Adds squalls and thunderstorms to yer lights.
option.mine-lights.enableEndFlashEffect: Enable th' Flash o' th' End
Be showin' ye th' purple flash from th' dark dimension o' th' End.
option.mine-lights.enableInWaterEffect.t: Highlights movement keys with a blue colour when submerged.
option.mine-lights.force_update.label: Look for New Treasure (Update)
option.mine-lights.force_update.tooltip: Forces a parley with the GitHub galleon for the latest server treasure map and plunders it if need be.
minelights.status.downloading: Status: Plunderin'... %d/%d MB o' booty (%d%%) ETA: %s Speed: %s MB/s
minelights.status.success: Status: Heave ho! The treasure be ours!
